déom retrofit

déom retrofit

The Déom Retrofit is a prime example of turning a maintenance challenge into an energy-efficient opportunity. Initially focused on repairing deteriorating brick joints, we worked closely with the client to reimagine the project as a comprehensive energy retrofit.

In addition to the masonry work, we implemented a full exterior insulation and airtightness solution. This not only enhanced the building’s thermal comfort but also reduced energy losses, extended the structure’s durability, and improved its long-term value.

The Déom Retrofit illustrates how our tailored expertise integrates sustainability into everyday renovations, delivering measurable benefits for both the building and its occupants.

project in numbers

Project Type: Residential, Consultation
Wall Surface Area: 1,800 sq. ft.
Timeline: 2 months
Completed In: 2024
